<rule id="springboot-properties-to-quarkus-00001" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="application-{profile}.{extension}"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Spring property profiles in separate files must be refactored into Quarkus properties file">
                    <message>
                        Spring property profile in separate file 'application-{profile}.{extension}' must have
                        their individual properties refactored to use Quarkus profile naming conventions within a single properties file,

                        ie in the format  %{profile}.config.key=value
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/config#configuration-profiles" title="Quarkus Configuring Your Application Guide"/>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/config-reference#configuration_profiles" title="Quarkus Configuration Reference Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="profile">
                <matches pattern=".+"/>
            </where>
            <where param="extension">
                <matches pattern="(properties|yml|yaml)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
